News

Improving library users' wellbeing at Thurston Library

Written by Alice Violett · Published Oct 24, 2018

The Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport recently interviewed Friends of Thurston Library chairman Richard Fawcett. The clip the DCMS produced will form part of a forthcoming longer video about Suffolk Libraries and highlights the real difference the library makes to the wellbeing of the local community.

Suffolk Libraries self-service kiosks in action

Written by Leon Paternoster · Published Oct 22, 2018

Self-service developer Leon demonstrates our self-service kiosks in action.

Suffolk Libraries offering free sanitary items to help fight period poverty

Written by Sarah Lungley · Published Oct 8, 2018

Suffolk Libraries is piloting providing free sanitary items, no questions asked, in ten different libraries.

Libraries Week 2018

Written by James Powell · Published Oct 8, 2018

Libraries Week takes place between 8–13 October to celebrate the nation’s libraries. This year, it focuses on wellbeing and how libraries bring communities together, combat loneliness, provide a space for reading and creativity and support people with their mental health.

Calling all young people: BLOC out your diaries for these taster days!

Written by James Powell · Published Oct 3, 2018

Suffolk Libraries is calling for young people across the county to have their say and help shape the Suffolk Libraries Arts Programme – BLOC.

Gainsborough Library wins Community Building Award

Written by James Powell · Published Sep 28, 2018

Gainsborough Community Library won the Village Hall or Community Building of the year award in this year’s Community Action Suffolk awards.

Suffolk Libraries holds its sixth Annual General Meeting

Written by James Powell · Published Sep 26, 2018

Suffolk Libraries held its sixth AGM on Tuesday 25 September.

Summer Reading Challenge a success again in Suffolk Libraries

Written by James Powell · Published Sep 25, 2018

Thousands of children across Suffolk have been collecting their certificates and medals from libraries after completing this year’s Summer Reading Challenge.

Local theatre company to tour Suffolk libraries in October

Written by James Powell · Published Sep 3, 2018

QuirkHouse Theatre Company will be bringing their flagship play, Talking in the Library, to its natural home for Libraries Week 2018.

Suffolk Libraries ‘Meet the Artist’ event introduces new arts programme

Written by James Powell · Published Aug 6, 2018

Suffolk Libraries has officially launched its exciting new arts programme.
